name: ToutSuite Social Club
tag_list: social-video, live-video, interactive, social-club, face-to-face, online-advertising, interactive-video, meet-your-maker
overview:
ToutSuite Social Club lets brand makers and consumers broadcast together on a dynamic, salon-style social video platform where the brand’s ongoing conversation lives.

An online video technology and service company, ToutSuite is providing interactive advertising, brand-building, and dynamic communication tools for a wide range of small- to medium-sized businesses.

The Company introduces a live, interactive element to consumers’ online content options allowing people to participate face-to-face in exclusive events from anywhere in the world; and enabling brand marketers to produce original interactive video series’ hosted with video archives and other dynamic content in their own “suite” or page on the ToutSuite website.

With the importance of social validation for today’s relevant brands, original video advertisements are created from each interactive ToutSuite show and placed in online ad space. When ads are clicked, visitors are delivered to the brand’s destination microsite on toutsuite.com where the brand’s full content and ongoing conversation lives; including Q&A video widgets, blogs, recipes, instructions, tips, video libraries, and fan profiles.
